example.text: For example, nearly $1 million in fraudulent Economic Injury Disaster Loans were taken out in the names of Johnson County residents. I called on the SBA to investigate these claims and hold victims blameless.

During my recent #SharicesShift with [[user]] Public Works, I saw firsthand how the bipartisan infrastructure law is improving stormwater maintenance in Wyandotte County. The infrastructure updates we make now will be felt by generations of Kansans to come! [[url]]

I also appreciated the President's focus on addressing China, both in an economic and national security context. I hope that will also be an area of bipartisan cooperation in Congress.

I just announced [[user]] and [[user]] received prestigious awards to boost advanced research and manufacturing jobs in our region. Thanks to the major, bipartisan manufacturing legislation I supported last year, our region is on track to lead the country in innovation & discovery!
